data.name: FluentXR
data.description:
Unlock a personalized language learning journey through your mixed reality home. FluentXR transforms your space into an interactive learning environment.

Step into a realm where learning is not just fun and effective, but also deeply personalized. FluentXR is not just another language learning app; it's your own private linguistics lab.

Tag real-world objects in your space with text and audio labels, making learning immersive and contextually relevant. Dive into our Word Shuffle mini-game to reinforce your skills and challenge yourself using the timer.

Current Features:
Space: Living Room
Main Language: English
Learning: French / français
Mini-Game: Word Shuffle
470+ available tags geared towards common living room objects such as “Couch”, “Television”, “Chess Set” and “Gaming Console”

FluentXR is an ever-evolving platform, continually expanding its selection of languages, locations, and mini-games. Achieve language mastery with FluentXR—where your home becomes your classroom.

Next Expansion: 
Space: Kitchen
Space: Bedroom
Main Language: French
Learning Language: Spanish / español 
Learning Language: English
Mini-Game: Sentence Scramble

translations.short_description:
Transform your language learning experience.

Utilizing mixed-reality passthrough technology turn your home into a dynamic classroom. Tag real-world objects in your living room with 470+ customizable tags for learning French. Sharpen your skills through the Word Shuffle mini-game.

FluentXR is an ever-evolving platform, updating with new languages and interactive mini-games. Dive into a context-rich home environment that's both captivating and practical.
